components.title: Form Type
components.tooltip:
An Form Type is a Data Collection inside the Application and Represents what the File Object will contain
Each Form Type Represents can contain a Form which will modify Data inside the File.
components.label: Entities
Name
components.tooltip: The Name for the Form Type used in the Application

components.label: Entity UUID
Actual Participant ROle Key
Start date field
components.tooltip: The Start Date Field which is used as the filter option in loading a List. When a Start Date Field is set, time taken to load a list view reduces.

components.label: End date field
components.tooltip: The End Date Field which is used as the filter option in loading a List. When a End Date Field is set, time taken to load a list view reduces.

components.label: Status field
components.tooltip: The Status Field which is used as the filter option in loading a List. When a Status Field is set, time taken to load a list view reduces.

components.label: Subscriber field
components.tooltip: The Subscriber Field which is used when the File Comments is enabled. This Field indicates to whom the chat messages needs to be sent when the message body doesn't contain any specific user name.It can be a single field or a comma-seperated field list.

components.label: Identifier field
components.tooltip: A unique identifier for a File or Application.

components.label: Message Title
components.tooltip: Message Title would be displayed at the beginning of a message thread

components.label: Attachment Field
components.tooltip: Uploaded files from chat will be attached to this field

components.label: RYG Rule
components.tooltip:
The RYG Rule for the Form Type
This is a javascript rule which is used to return the Colour Based on any and all Fields in the Form Type
